system:

class ../tracker/new_tracker.xmlNEW_TRACKER
inherit ../tracker/command.xmlCOMMAND

feature {NONE}
f_make../tracker/new_tracker.xml#f_makemake (max_phase_radiation: ../mathmodels/value.xmlVALUE; max_container_radiation: ../mathmodels/value.xmlVALUE) local tracker_access: ../tracker/tracker_access.xmlTRACKER_ACCESS do ../tracker/command.xml#f_tracktrack := tracker_access.../tracker/tracker_access.xml#f_mM ../tracker/command.xml#f_statestate := ../tracker/command.xml#f_tracktrack.../tracker/tracker.xml#f_get_stateget_state ../tracker/command.xml#f_msgmsg := ../tracker/command.xml#f_m_am_a.../tracker/messages_access.xml#f_okOk ../tracker/new_tracker.xml#f_max_cont_radmax_cont_rad := max_container_radiation ../tracker/new_tracker.xml#f_max_phase_radmax_phase_rad := max_phase_radiation end
f_make_init../tracker/new_tracker.xml#f_make_initmake_init (max_phase_radiation: ../mathmodels/value.xmlVALUE; max_container_radiation: ../mathmodels/value.xmlVALUE) local tracker_access: ../tracker/tracker_access.xmlTRACKER_ACCESS do ../tracker/command.xml#f_tracktrack := tracker_access.../tracker/tracker_access.xml#f_mM ../tracker/command.xml#f_statestate := 0 ../tracker/command.xml#f_msgmsg := ../tracker/command.xml#f_m_am_a.../tracker/messages_access.xml#f_okOk ../tracker/new_tracker.xml#f_max_cont_radmax_cont_rad := max_container_radiation ../tracker/new_tracker.xml#f_max_phase_radmax_phase_rad := max_phase_radiation end
feature -- Attributes
f_max_cont_rad../tracker/new_tracker.xml#f_max_cont_radmax_cont_rad: ../mathmodels/value.xmlVALUE
f_max_phase_rad../tracker/new_tracker.xml#f_max_phase_radmax_phase_rad: ../mathmodels/value.xmlVALUE
feature
f_execute../tracker/new_tracker.xml#f_executeexecute do ../tracker/command.xml#f_tracktrack.../tracker/tracker.xml#f_new_trackernew_tracker (../tracker/new_tracker.xml#f_max_phase_radmax_phase_rad, ../tracker/new_tracker.xml#f_max_cont_radmax_cont_rad) end
